body: Floating point computation, numerical rootfinding, interpolation, numerical quadrature, direct methods for linear systems. Students may take only one course for credit from MATH 451 and MATH 455.(Credits: 3)(Prerequisites: Enforced Prerequisite: (CMPSC 201 or CMPSC 202 or CMPSC 121 or CMPSC 131) and MATH 220 and (MATH 230 or MATH 231))(Additional Attributes: Cross-listed with: MATH 455)
contentHtml: Floating point computation, numerical rootfinding, interpolation, numerical quadrature, direct methods for linear systems. Students may take only one course for credit from MATH 451 and MATH 455.(Credits: 3)(Prerequisites: Enforced Prerequisite: (CMPSC 201 or CMPSC 202 or CMPSC 121 or CMPSC 131) and MATH 220 and (MATH 230 or MATH 231))(Additional Attributes: Cross-listed with: MATH 455)
title: CMPSC 455: Introduction to Numerical Analysis I
